mapper.sql: t.pkid pkid, t.id id, t.sybgc sybgc, t.rl rl, t.jsll jsll, t.gwxs gwxs, t.tcwz tcwz, t.tcsl tcsl, t.jgid jgid, t.jlzt jlzt, t.cszt cszt, t.sjbb sjbb, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.ywxtbsid ywxtbsid, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.bz bz, TO_CHAR(t.vercol,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') vercol, t.tbjdh tbjdh, TO_CHAR(t.tbsjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') tbsjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, TO_CHAR(t.reserve3,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve3
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM SY_XFSCSXXX t WHERE 1=1 AND JLZT = 0

SELECT
FROM SY_XFSCSXXX t WHERE t.JLZT = 0
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SY_XFSCSXXX(pkid,id,sybgc,rl,jsll,gwxs,tcwz,tcsl,jgid,jlzt,cszt,sjbb,cjsj,ywxtbsid,sjc,bz,vercol,tbjdh,tbsjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3) VALUES(#{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sybgc,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{rl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jsll,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gwxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tcwz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tcsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{vercol,jdbcType=DATE},#{tbjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tbsjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE SY_XFSCSXXX t SET t.JLZT = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND t.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO SY_XFSCSXXX(pkid,id,sybgc,rl,jsll,gwxs,tcwz,tcsl,jgid,jlzt,cszt,sjbb,cjsj,ywxtbsid,sjc,bz,vercol,tbjdh,tbsjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3) VALUES
#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} id,#{item.sybgc,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sybgc,#{item.rl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} rl,#{item.jsll,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jsll,#{item.gwxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} gwxs,#{item.tcwz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} tcwz,#{item.tcsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} tcsl,#{item.jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgid,#{item.jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jlzt,#{item.cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} cszt,#{item.sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sjbb,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ywxtbsid,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.vercol,jdbcType=DATE} vercol,#{item.tbjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} tbjdh,#{item.tbsjc,jdbcType=DATE} tbsjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=DATE} reserve3
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE pkid = VALUES(pkid), id = VALUES(id), sybgc = VALUES(sybgc), rl = VALUES(rl), jsll = VALUES(jsll), gwxs = VALUES(gwxs), tcwz = VALUES(tcwz), tcsl = VALUES(tcsl), jgid = VALUES(jgid), jlzt = VALUES(jlzt), cszt = VALUES(cszt), sjbb = VALUES(sjbb), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), ywxtbsid = VALUES(ywxtbsid), sjc = VALUES(sjc), bz = VALUES(bz), vercol = VALUES(vercol), tbjdh = VALUES(tbjdh), tbsjc = VALUES(tbsjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM SY_XFSCSXXX t WHERE t.JLZT = 0

SELECT
FROM SY_XFSCSXXX t WHERE t.JLZT = 0 AND t.id = #{id}
